row.process:
@echo off :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
set /a errors=0 > nul
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Owner" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_OWNER# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_OWNER#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE_CMD@WINDOWS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Path '&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#' doesn't exist." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR set /a errors=1 >nul )
! Check EXT: in value :IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 set retcode=100 goto :retcode :ENDIF
! stop execution if validation errors occurred if %errors% gtr 0 ( set retcode=1 goto :retcode )
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
icacls "&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#" /setowner &UC4RB_FILE_OWNER# /T /C :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
